verses.roman:
ei-mata pratyabda āise gauḍera bhakta-gaṇa
prabhu-saṅge rahi' kare yātrā-daraśana

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; prati-abda—every year; āise—come; gauḍera—of Bengal; bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees; prabhu-saṅge—with Lord Śrī Caitanya Prabhu; rahi'-residing; kare—do; yātrā-daraśana—observing the Ratha-yātrā festival.
translation: Every year the devotees of Bengal would come and stay with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to see the Ratha-yātrā festival.
